snippet: The Supreme Court rejected an extradition request from Spain for 13 former officers accused of ordering the killings of six Jesuit priests, their housekeeper and her daughter during the country’s civil war.
abstract: El Salvador's Supreme Court rejects an extradition request from Spain for 13 former officers accused of ordering the killings of six Jesuit priests, their housekeeper and her daughter during El Salvador's civil war.
lead_paragraph: The Supreme Court rejected an extradition request from Spain for 13 former officers accused of ordering the killings of six Jesuit priests, their housekeeper and her daughter during the country’s civil war.

headline.main: El Salvador: Court Denies Spain Request for Extradition of Suspects in Killings
headline.print_headline: El Salvador: Court Denies Spain Request For Extradition of Suspects in Killings
